Class AppointmentDAO

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Handles database queries related to scheduling appointments.

      • getAppointment

        public static Appointment getAppointment​(int customerId,
                                         java.time.LocalDateTime startTime)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets a single appointment from the database.
        Parameters:
        customerId - The ID of the customer with whom the appointment is scheduled.
        startTime - The start time of the appointment.
        Returns:
        An appointment object representing the requested appointment.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - An exception related to the database query.

        Returns:
        A list of all appointments.

        public static boolean deleteAppointment​(int appointmentId)
        Deletes an appointment from the database.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • deleteAllAppointmentsByCustomer

        public static void deleteAllAppointmentsByCustomer​(int customerId)
        Deletes all appointments associated with a specific customer.
        Parameters:
        customerId - The ID of the customer whose appointments will be deleted.
